sen.j: 帝国農会（ていこくのうかい）とは、1910年（明治43年）に公認された、中央農政機関のことである。
sen.e: Empire Agricultural Association refers to the central agricultural administration organization approved in 1910.
Empire Agricultural Association refers to the central agricultural administration organization approved in 1910.
Empire Agricultural Association refers to the central agricultural administration organization approved in 1910.

tit.cmt: 用語集の訳を使いました。

sen.j: 1881年に成立した大日本農会と、1895年に成立した全国農事会が、帝国農会の前身である。
sen.e: Agricultural Society of Japan established in 1881 and National Agricultural Association founded in 1895 are the predecessors of Empire Agricultural Association.
sen.cmt: 全国農事会の定訳がみつかりませんでした。
sen.e: Agricultural Society of Japan established in 1881 and National Agricultural Association founded in 1895 are the predecessors of Empire Agricultural Association.
Agricultural Society of Japan established in 1881 and National Agricultural Association founded in 1895 are the predecessors of Empire Agricultural Association.

sen.j: 大日本農会の幹事長であった前田正名は、農会法の制定に尽力した。
sen.e: Masana MAEDA, the former secretary general of Agricultural Society of Japan, devoted himself to the establishment of the Agricultural Society Law.
Masana MAEDA, the former secretary general of Agricultural Society of Japan, devoted himself to the establishment of the Agricultural Society Law.
Masana MAEDA, the former secretary general of Agricultural Society of Japan, devoted himself to the establishment of the Agricultural Society Law.

sen.j: 1899年に農会法が成立すると、全国農事会は自身を系統農会の中央機関と位置づけるようになり、1907年に帝国農会と改称し、1910年に法制化を実現した。
sen.e: After the Agricultural Society Law was established in 1899, National Agricultural Association began to position themselves as a central organization of agricultural association system, changed its name to Empire Agricultural Association in 1907, and realized the legislation in 1910.

After the Agricultural Society Law was established in 1899, National Agricultural Association began to position themselves as a central organization of agricultural association system, changed its name to Empire Agricultural Association in 1907, and realized the legislation in 1910.

After the Agricultural Society Law was established in 1899, National Agricultural Association began to position themselves as a central organization of agricultural association system, changed its name to Empire Agricultural Association in 1907, and realized the legislation in 1910.

sen.j: 農業の技術的、経済的発展および改良を目的として設立された。
sen.e: It was founded for the purposes of technical, economical development and improvement of agriculture.
It was founded for the purposes of technical, economical development and improvement of agriculture.
It was founded for the purposes of technical, economical development and improvement of agriculture.

sen.j: そのため、農業技術の指導、農業に関する調査研究、農産物価格の統制、小作争議の抑制、農民の福利増進などに取り組んだ。
sen.e: Therefore, it worked on assistance of agricultural technique, research study on agriculture, regulation of price of farm products, control of agrarian dispute, and welfare enhancement of farmers.
Therefore, it worked on assistance of agricultural technique, research study on agriculture, regulation of price of farm products, control of agrarian dispute, and welfare enhancement of farmers.
Therefore, it worked on assistance of agricultural technique, research study on agriculture, regulation of price of farm products, control of agrarian dispute, and welfare enhancement of farmers.

sen.j: また、農業保護とともに、地主の利益擁護の側面が強い。
sen.e: It also emphasizes the aspects of advocacy for landlords' interests along with agricultural protection.
It also emphasizes the aspects of advocacy for landlords' interests along with agricultural protection.
It also emphasizes the aspects of advocacy for landlords' interests along with agricultural protection.

sen.j: 道府県および郡市町村の農会を系統的に組織した全国的中央機関であり、下部組織として道府県農会を持ち、多額の国庫補助を受ける官製団体である。
sen.e: It is a national central organization which consists of systematically organized agricultural societies of Hokkaido and prefectures as well as local authorities, and it has an agricultural society of Hokkaido and prefectures as a lower organization and is a government agencies body which receives a large amount of government subsidy.
sen.cmt: 郡市町村をlocal authorities としてまとめました。
sen.e: It is a national central organization which consists of systematically organized agricultural societies of Hokkaido and prefectures as well as local authorities, and it has an agricultural society of Hokkaido and prefectures as a lower organization and is a government agencies body which receives a large amount of government subsidy.

It is a national central organization which consists of systematically organized agricultural societies of Hokkaido and prefectures as well as local authorities, and it has an agricultural society of Hokkaido and prefectures as a lower organization and is a government agencies body which receives a large amount of government subsidy.

sen.j: 1928年から「市況通報」を発行した（1937年、「日本農業新聞」に改題）。
sen.e: The paper called "Market Trend Report" was released from 1928 (the name was changed into "Japan Agriculture Times"in 1937).
sen.cmt: 雑誌名の正式英文は不明です。
sen.e: The paper called 'Market Trend Report' was released from 1928 (the name was changed into 'Japan Agriculture Times' in 1937).
The paper called 'Market Trend Report' was released from 1928 (the name was changed into 'Japan Agriculture Times' in 1937).

sen.j: 1943年、農業団体法の成立によって中央農業会に統合された。
sen.e: In 1943, it merged with Central Agricultural Society due to the establishment of Agriculture Organization Act.
In 1943, it merged with Central Agricultural Society due to the establishment of Agriculture Organization Act.
In 1943, it merged with Central Agricultural Society due to the establishment of Agriculture Organization Act.
